rows.label: tlk70000007_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm envious of Joey and Marco
always running around outside and
chatting with folk... Hack! Haargh!

rows.label: tlk70000007_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Sorry... I guess I'm a bit shy lately.
I don't really get the chance to meet a
lot of people, you see.

rows.label: tlk70000007_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Maybe I know something helpful,
though... Oh! There are lots of really
neat shops all over Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000007_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sure if you have a look, you'll find
tons of stuff that's useful for Drivers
and Blades.

rows.label: tlk70000007_01_msg0005
rows.name:
I really wish I could go, but going to
busy places makes me too tired.
